name: GroentenFruit Huis
goal: The GroentenFruit Huis (Fresh Produce Centre) is the organisation that speaks with one voice on behalf of the fruit and vegetable sector.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Customs, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: REFIT of legislation of plant protection and MRL setting, Import- export related regulation. Custom regulation, AGRI Policy. DG-Sant? Phytosanitary legislation and control regulation.
